articles.description: Dinesh Karthik and Rishabh Pant both are selected for the T20 World Cup 2022 just like the recent T20I series against Australia. The big question which still haunts the Indian dressing room is which player is suitable for their strong batting lineup.
articles.content: Dinesh Karthik and Rishabh Pant both are selected for the T20 World Cup 2022 just like the recent T20I series against Australia. The big question which still haunts the Indian dressing room is which … [+3026 chars]

articles.title: Green's performances very impressive and bodes well, says McDonald | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: While admitting that his side needs to improve at the death, the Australian coach sounded optimistic going forward with Starc set to bolster the XI
articles.content:
Green smashed 52 off 21 in the third T20I © BCCI
